executable.title: UKF Tractography
executable.description: This module traces fibers in a DWI Volume using the multiple tensor unscented Kalman Filter methology. For more informations check the documentation.
executable.contributor: Yogesh Rathi, Stefan Lienhard, Yinpeng Li, Martin Styner, Ipek Oguz, Yundi Shi, Christian Baumgartner

image.name: seedsFile
image.label: Input Label Map
image.description: Seeds for diffusion. If not specified, full brain tractography will be performed, and the algorithm will start from every voxel in the brain mask where the Generalized Anisotropy is bigger than 0.18

integer-vector.name: labels
integer-vector.label: ROI label to use for seeding
integer-vector.description: A vector of the ROI labels to be used

geometry.name: tracts
geometry.label: Output Fibers (first tensor)
geometry.description: Tracts generated, with first tensor output

geometry.name: tractsWithSecondTensor
geometry.label: Output Fibers (second tensor, optional)
geometry.description: Tracts generated, with second tensor output (if there is one)

boolean.name: writeBinaryTracts
boolean.label: Write Binary Tracts File
boolean.description: Write tract file as a VTK binary data file

parameters.label: Model options
parameters.description: Which model should be used for tractography

boolean.name: simpleTensorModel
boolean.label: Use simple tensor model
boolean.description: Whether to use the simple tensor model. If unchecked, use the full tensor model

boolean.name: freeWater
boolean.label: Estimate term for free water
boolean.description: Adds a term for free water difusion to the model. If checked, the 1T simple model is forced.

parameters.label: Stopping Criteria
parameters.description: if one or more of the criteria are fulfilled the fiber stops

double.name: minFA
double.label: Terminating FA (defaults set runtime)
double.description: Abort the tractography when the Fractional Anisotropy is less than this value

double.name: minGA
double.label: Terminating minimum Generalized Anisotropy
double.description: Abort the tractography when the Generalized Anisotropy is less than this value

parameters.label: UKFFiber scalar fields
parameters.description: Scalars to be recorded together with the traced fiber

boolean.name: recordFA
boolean.label: Record FA
boolean.description: Whether to store FA. Attaches field 'FA', and 'FA2' for 2-tensor case to fiber.

boolean.name: recordNMSE
boolean.label: Record normalized MSE
boolean.description: Whether to store NMSE. Attaches field 'NMSE' to fiber.

boolean.name: recordTrace
boolean.label: Record Trace
boolean.description: Whether to store Trace. Attaches field 'Trace', and 'Trace2' for 2-tensor case to fiber.

boolean.name: recordFreeWater
boolean.label: Record Free Water
boolean.description: Whether to store the fraction of free water. Attaches field 'FreeWater' to fiber.

boolean.name: recordState
boolean.label: Record states
boolean.description: Whether to attach the states to the fiber. Will generate field 'state'.

boolean.name: recordCovariance
boolean.label: Record the covariance
boolean.description: Whether to store the covariance. Will generate field 'covariance' in fiber.

boolean.name: recordTensors
boolean.label: Record the tensors
boolean.description: Recording the tensors enables Slicer to color the fiber bundles by FA, orientation, and so on. The fields will be called 'TensorN', where N is the tensor number.

parameters.label: Advanced Options
parameters.description: Parameters for tractography. Note: Some values are set runtime. However, if set to a value here, this value will be used.

integer.name: numThreads
integer.label: Number of threads
integer.description: Number of threads used during computation. Set to the number of cores on your workstation for optimal speed. If left undefined the number of cores detected will be used.

boolean.name: normalizedDWIData
boolean.label: The DWI data is normalized
boolean.description: Whether the DWI input data is already normalized

double.name: stepLength
double.label: Step length of tractography(in mm)
double.description: Step length of tractography, in millimeters

double-vector.name: weightsOnTensors
double-vector.label: Weights on tensors
double-vector.description: Weights on different tensors when using multiple tensors. There must be one weight for each tensor, and the weights must sum up to 1. Default to equally weighted

double.name: maxHalfFiberLength
double.label: Maximum half-fiber length limit(in mm)
double.description: The max length limit of the half fibers generated during tractography. Here the fiber is "half" because the tractography goes in only one direction from one seed point at a time

double.name: seedFALimit
double.label: The FA limit for seed potins to be valid
double.description: Seed points whose FA are below this value are excluded

double.name: Qw
double.label: Process noise for free water weights
double.description: Process noise for free water weights, ignored if no free water estimation

double.name: maxBranchingAngle
double.label: Maximum branching angle
double.description: Maximum branching angle, in degrees. When using multiple tensors, a new branch will be created when the tensors' major directions form an angle between (minBranchingAngle, maxBranchingAngle). Branching is supressed when this maxBranchingAngle is set to 0.0

double.name: minBranchingAngle
double.label: Minimum branching angle
double.description: Minimum branching angle, in degrees. When using multiple tensors, a new branch will be created when the tensors' major directions form an angle between (minBranchingAngle, maxBranchingAngle)

boolean.name: noTransformPosition
boolean.label: Don't transform fibers ijk->RAS
boolean.description: Don't transform Points back from ijk->RAS when writing the output fiber

boolean.name: branchesOnly
boolean.label: Only write branches out
boolean.description: Only output branches, ignore the primary tracts

boolean.name: storeGlyphs
boolean.label: Store tensors' main directions
boolean.description: Store tensors' main directions as two-point lines in a separate file named glyphs_{tracts}. When using multiple tensors, only the major tensors' main directions are stored

boolean.name: outputNormalizedDWIData
boolean.label: Output the normalized DWI data
boolean.description: Whether to output the normalized DWI data
